name: Djorick's curse
description:
The Curse of Djorick has been released and it is up to you to push back the minions from whence they came. Use your wits to vanquish your foes and gather riches. Arcane spells will aide you as you battle increasingly powerful and cunning enemies (who can unleash spells of their own)!

Match 3 tiles of similar type or more to attack, heal, repair, or collect gold in this match three style role playing game.
*9 unique monsters--with more to come!
*21 unique spells--with more to come!
*Collect coins and upgrade your weapons and armor whenever you want--the shop is always open!
*tons of unique weapons and armor--equip rare and epic gear to aid you on your quest!
*3 modes of difficulty each with progressive challenges!
*Constant save system: quite the game and return at any time!
* Unique skill choices within each class--you choose how you want to play!
* Great replay value.
*Free future updates: new classes, monsters, spells and more!


We are a developer and artist that are fans of Dungeon Raid and wanted to add our own unique twist to the genre of tile-matching RPGs!


Gamezebo -- "Easy to play but hard to master - fast fingers won't get you far in this match-three game."
